text: Shanghai Metro Line 1 is a north-south metro line operated by Shanghai Metro, connecting Xinzhuang Station in Minhang District, Shanghai, China to Fujin Road Station in Baoshan District. It is 38.18 kilometers long and has 28 stations. It was opened on May 28, 1993. It is the first metro line in Shanghai and one of the busiest and most important lines in the Shanghai Metro network. == Station List == Category:All articles with unsourced statements Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Shanghai Metro Line 1
